attributes.action: Pass a law the prevents expensive parking charges at hospitals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For most people a trip to the hospital is not a happy occassion. It rubs salt into the wound when the fee for parking is more than many people can afford if they need to make regular visits. Parking fees should cover costs and not be more than £1 per visit. Permits could be issued to prevent misuse of car parks but we should all be United Against Unfair Parking Charges in Hospitals.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
